purpose: To assist users in the command line by providing AI-driven suggestions and automation.
principle: Utilizes AI to analyze command line inputs and provide context-aware suggestions and automations.
reusability: Designed to be easily integrated into existing command line workflows, with support for popular shells like Zsh.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited command recognition and integration capabilities.
